attributes.action: Make all straws bendy to the maximum!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Make all straws bendy to the maximum!

For years our generation (the teenage generation)have loathed for bendy straws that bend from top to bottom, Instead we make do with only an inch or two of bendiness on our straws, I ask thee, Bend them to the maximum, And may all benders praise you!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
